# GitHub Actions Secrets

To allow the github action workflows to run, the following secrets are required:

### FEED_ACCESSTOKEN
This is an Azure DevOps Personal Access Token (PAT).
This is used to connect to the Avani NuGet feed for builds. 
It is also used to pull any submodules needed to build the application and the infrastructure

It requires the permissions: `packaging:read`, `packaging:write`, `code:read`

### ACR_USERNAME
This is the username of the admin account for the Azure Container Registry.

Can be found in the `settings` tab of the ACR.

### ACR_PASSWORD
This is the password of the admin account for the Azure Container Registry.

Can be found in the `settings` tab of the ACR.

### OCTOPUS_URL

The base URL of the octopus server (i.e. https://avanisolutions.octopus.app/)

### OCTOPUS_API_KEY

An API key generated by Octopus. Can be accessed at https://avanisolutions.octopus.app/app#/Spaces-1/users/me/apiKeys

It requires the permissions `BuildInFeedPush`
